price: 35. Kaip malonę iš Mūsų. Štai taip Mes apdovanojame tuos, kurie yra dėkingi (paklusdami Mums).
arabic: نِّعۡمَةٗ مِّنۡ عِندِنَاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي مَن شَكَرَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: niʿ'matan min ʿindinā kadhālika najzī man shakara
